column4: Just added a secondary pci trident video card. Was hoping it would just start working, but it didn't. Was I expecting too much?
you have to configure it in xorg.conf
read the gentoo guide to dual monitors
gentoo, isn't that another distro? 'i'm on ubuntu. Should hotplug have reognised it?
the gentoo tutorial doesnt have anything gentoo specific in it
it may have recognised the monitor and card but that doesnt mean itll use it
tbh dual monitors with X is a bitch
you dont want to follow it word for word
just set up xorg.conf like it says, and take a backup, and know how to revert to that backup if X doesnt start
great... what am I getting myself into??
okay then, how do I start X with a particular xorg.conf?
and how do I set it to boot into X using a certain .conf?
if you dont know how to alter, back up, and restore your xorg.conf then you shouldnt be trying to use dual monitors
If I just backup the original, and I know how to start it manually, I should be safe, no?
